item.title: Kelly Osbourne Says ‘I Am So Sad’ After Ozzy Osbourne’s Death: ‘I Feel Unhappy… I Lost the Best Friend I Ever Had’
item.description: Kelly Osbourne is mourning the loss of her father Ozzy following his death on Tuesday. Osbourne posted a brief message to her Instagram stories on Thursday afternoon. “I feel unhappy I am so sad
